meta_properties.og:title: Reading Titus Together - Episode 1
meta_properties.og:description: For a generation that faces the challenge of choosing between Social Justice and the Gospel of Jesus, Paul's letter to Titus is as important today as it was 2000 years ago. Come study this short and important letter with me.
meta_properties.article:author: http://fellipebrito.com/about/
